title: PPPP’s M. Arif Khan Mehar wins PS-8 election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 9 (APP): Pakistan People’s Party Parliamentarians’ (PPPP) Muhammad Arif Khan Mehar has won the Sindh Assembly election from PS-8, Shikarpur-II by securing 64016 votes.
According to the unofficial result issued by the Returning Officer/ECP, his runner-up was Abid Hussain of Jamiat Ulmah–e–Islam Pakistan (JIP) who bagged 51869 votes.
Overall voters’ turn-out remained 62.97 %.
